All functions

combine_forecast_observations()

Title

create_flare_metadata()

Generate metadata (EML) using the Ecological Forecasting Initiatve Standards

create_glm_inflow_outflow_files()

Title

create_obs_matrix()

Create matrix of observations in the format required by run_ENKF

generate_glm_met_files()

Convert NOAA forecasts to GLM format

generate_initial_conditions()

Generate initial conditions from observations and default values

generate_oxygen_management()

Generate management list required to simulate oxygen inputs

generate_states_to_obs_mapping()

Convert columns the map states to observations to a single vector

initiate_model_error()

Initiate model error from configuration files

plotting_general()

Plotting FLARE output

run_da_forecast()

Run ensemble Kalman filter to assimilate observations and/or produce forecasts

write_forecast_netcdf()

Write netcdf output file from object created by run_ENKF
